import sys

def ispalin(n):
    s1 = str(n)
    s2 = s1[::-1]
    if(s1==s2):
        return 1
    else:
        return 0
def main():
    i = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    #print "yo"
    while i!=0:
        #print i
        count =1
        i=i-1
        l = sys.stdin.readline()
        #print "came"
        ans = int(l)+ 1
        while ispalin(ans)==0:
            ans = ans + 1
        print ans
main()
